item.description: 面试题 02.07. 链表相交 # 题目 # 给定两个单链表的头节点headA和headB，找出并返回两个单链表的起始节点。如果两个链表没有交点，返回null。 思路 # 代码 # public class ListNode { int val; ListNode next; ListNode(int x) { val = x; next = null; } } public class Solution { public ListNode getIntersectionNode(ListNode headA, ListNode headB) { if (headA == null || headB == null) return null; ListNode ptrA = headA, ptrB = headB; while (ptrA != ptrB) { ptrA = ptrA.next; ptrB = ptrB.next; if (ptrA == null && ptrB == null) return null; else if (ptrA == null) ptrA = headB; else if (ptrB == null) ptrB = headA; } return ptrA; } }
